modlist.Name: Potatoes' Custom Guns
Author: Potatoes
modlist.Description:
Potatoes' Compiled Custom Guns, AKA PCCG, is a massive mod comprising of several dozen firearms made by me, Potatoes. The current list stands at (including variants):
28 pistols,
10 shotguns,
11 SMGs,
27 rifles,
8 MGs,
and two explosive devices.

modlist.Name: Meat's Mags
Author: Meat_Banono
modlist.Description:
Updated and improved with a new account! 
It is my pleasure to bring you Meat's Magazines! I have knocked out dozens of magazines I wanted to see most in H3, and conveniently found all the assets...elsewhere online...
This update to Meat's Magazines adds literally another dozen or more magazines, I lost count honestly. That means more menus, more rounds, more fun!Now extended magazines have their own menu alongside miscellaneous magazines which I will continue to dump mags into as I make them.

modlist.Name: ModulAR
Author: KamikazeF0X
modlist.Description:
Build your own AR how you want it!
You will find all the parts in Pistol > Lever Action

modlist.Name: Meat's ModulAR Parts
Author: Meat_Banono
modlist.Description:
Welcome to Meat's Massive ModulAR Pack! This meaty pack expands on Kamikaze Fox's ModulAR platform with countless additional items; Receivers, Handguards, Stocks, Pistolgrips, this has it all. Please install Kamikaze's ModulAR for the base content like barrels.
Receivers and Pistolgrips can be found under Pistol - Lever Action Handgun
Handguards and grips are found under Attachments - Foregrips
Stocks are found under Attachments - Stocks
To install: follow all requirements for LSIIC and Sideloader, then drag the zip into your virtualobjects folder. If you don't have one, create one.
Handy tips: Pistol grips are best detached by grabbing slightly in front of the bottom of the grip when attached.
Handguards are best attached after barrels, and are easiest to attach in a quickbelt slot like your shoulder.

modlist.Name: Meats ModulM4 Overhaul
Author: MeatBanono
Meloncorp
modlist.Description:
It's finally here. The U.S. Meat Corps is more than proud to announce the official overhaul and re-release of ModulAR!

A month overdue but with countless more attachments, more than a dozen new receivers, and an almost infinite number of possible combinations. I'm serious, we did the math, and not including magazines there are over 3 billion possible combinations waiting for you to assemble. Dive deep!

You will find everything located under the Modular Workshop category on the main page of the itemspawner, give the mod some time to load and it will auto-populate the itemspawner, even if you are already in a scene! There are new receivers, barrels, magazines, stocks, and more! Please refer to the U.S.M.C Instructional Training video posted above for assembly instructions! There is also a handy infographic above most items pointing out where to attach and detach all your AR bling.

A massive thanks to Meloncorp for making this overhaul as massive as it is, and all of my beta testers for ensuring the highest quality and user experience for this mod! A thank you to you to for downloading this mod and reading this far! 

Mods like this cost so much in time and effort, if you are feeling generous or wish to fund the Meat Banana Manufacturing Group here is a link to me Ko-Fi page for any donations, much love! 
Ko-fi.com/meatbanana

modlist.Name: Meat's ModulMPX and MCX
Author: Meat_Banono
modlist.Description:
The long awaited and requested SIG MPX and MCX! With several possible attachments I just had to make it modular, so included in this mod are: 
For the MCX: Caliber conversions for .300 Blackout and 5.56, 2 Handguard lengths, 3 Barrels, 4 stocks and a tube stock adapter.
For the MPX: 6 different Handguards, accepts all MCX stocks, and if you have KamikazeFox's ModulAR Barrels (which I will say are required for this mod: https://bonetome.com/h3vr/weapons/159/) you have 6 barrel lengths as well!
There are also two SIG muzzle brakes and suppressors.
The ModulMPX and ModulMCX are found under Lever Action Handguns in the Pistols category. The Muzzle Devices are located under Suppressors.

modlist.Name: Turt's Side ChARger
Author: Meat_Banono
modlist.Description:
Its a ModulAR receiver but you grab it by the bolt.
Shoot it. Reload it. ch-CHUNK.
Found in Pistols - Lever Action Handguns
Use with my ARParts mod to make it usable
Many thanks Turtle for the model and idea!

modlist.Name: Meat's ModulSR
Author: Meat_Banono
modlist.Description:
It's big toy time. If 7.62x51mm can be considered a toy. Anyways, the SR-25 is here and it's ModulAR compatible! This rifle is full power and lets you know it, but recovers quickly from its higher recoil once kitted out so pace your shots. 
In this pack are:
SR25
10 and 20 round magazines (compatible with P762 magazines)
457mm and 558mm barrels
3 handguards
2 insane muzzlebrakes
Pure recoil (you'll see what I mean when you install this)

modlist.Name: Meat's ModulAK (Vanilla Edition)
Author: Meat_Banono
Nikpo
Jayyden
Andrew_FTW
modlist.Description:
PLEASE DELETE YOUR OLD AKPARTS AND MODULPP FOLDERS FROM VIRTUAL OBJECTS IF YOU ARE UPDATING

THIS VERSION OF THE MOD DOES NOT SIMULATE MAG LATCH BEHAVIOUR: SIMPLY GRAB THE MAGAZINE TO REMOVE IT

ModulAK steels its way through the tundra and winter of Russia to find its way back to Bonetome, bigger, badder, and stronger then ever. Featuring a changelog literally too long to post, this mod has functionally been rebuilt from the bottom up. 

Included in this re-release are:
RECEIVERS
-AKM              Assault Rifles
-AK74N            Assault Rifles
-AK101            Assault Rifles
-AK102            Assault Rifles
-AK103            Assault Rifles
-AK104            Assault Rifles
-AK105            Assault Rifles
-AKS74UN          Carbines
-PP19 Vityaz      SMGs
-Saiga 9 Carbine  SMGS

ATTACHMENTS
-Literally over 100 different attachments
-Please watch the tutorial to find them

MAGAZINES
-Every AK magazine from Meat's Mags has been retextured and included in this mod (still compatible, dont go deleting Meat's Mags)
-Added several new magazines in addition, located at the end of the Assault Rifles category

If you have any questions, please feel free to ping me, @Meat_banono in either the mods-general section of the H3VR discord or in the general help channel of the H3VR Homebrew Server

I want to thank Nikpo for some excellent FDE retextures, Jayyden for the amazing infographic panels, Andrew_FTW for the brilliantly soviet Icons, all of my beta testers, and especially the Escape from Tarkov team, whose models and textures I truly have unending admiration of. I hope you will too after some up close time with these weapons. Thank you for downloading this mod!

modlist.Name: Meat's ModulAK (Enhanced Edition)
Author: Meat_Banono
Nikpo
Jayyden
Andrew_FTW
modlist.Description:
PLEASE DELETE YOUR OLD AKPARTS AND MODULPP FOLDERS FROM VIRTUAL OBJECTS IF YOU ARE UPDATING

THIS VERSION OF THE MOD INTRODUCES SIMULATED MAG LATCH BEHAVIOUR: TO REMOVE A MAGAZINE YOU MUST GRAB AND PRESS DOWN ON YOUR TOUCHPAD OR THUMBSTICK TO RELEASE THE LATCH

ModulAK steels its way through the tundra and winter of Russia to find its way back to Bonetome, bigger, badder, and stronger then ever. Featuring a changelog literally too long to post, this mod has functionally been rebuilt from the bottom up. 

Included in this re-release are:
RECEIVERS
-AKM              Assault Rifles
-AK74N            Assault Rifles
-AK101            Assault Rifles
-AK102            Assault Rifles
-AK103            Assault Rifles
-AK104            Assault Rifles
-AK105            Assault Rifles
-AKS74UN          Carbines
-PP19 Vityaz      SMGs
-Saiga 9 Carbine  SMGS

ATTACHMENTS
-Literally over 100 different attachments
-Please watch the tutorial to find them

MAGAZINES
-Every AK magazine from Meat's Mags has been retextured and included in this mod (still compatible, dont go deleting Meat's Mags)
-Added several new magazines in addition, located at the end of the Assault Rifles category

If you have any questions, please feel free to ping me, @Meat_banono in either the mods-general section of the H3VR discord or in the general help channel of the H3VR Homebrew Server

I want to thank Nikpo for some excellent FDE retextures, Jayyden for the amazing infographic panels, Andrew_FTW for the brilliantly soviet Icons, all of my beta testers, and especially the Escape from Tarkov team, whose models and textures I truly have unending admiration of. I hope you will too after some up close time with these weapons. Thank you for downloading this mod!

modlist.Name: Meat's ModulShotguns
Author: Meat_Banono
Tacticalloon
PretendTurtle
modlist.Description:
BLAM CH-CHUNK BLAM CH-CHUNK BLAM
It's ModulShotgun time! 4 receivers, dozens of parts, and whole lot of shells! This shotgun show stars:
Modul870, the Remington Classic!
ModulMP133, Baikal pump action from Russia!
ModulMP153, the MP133's semi auto comrade!
ModulIthaca, hot 20ga. slam fire action!
All of these can be found in the tube-fed shotguns category, and are complemented by a suite of chokes in the muzzle attachments category as well. There is also a Chainsaw grip for the memes in the foregrip category as well.
To detach these parts:
Pumps: Grab just behind the pumps to detach.
Stocks: Grab just above where the stock meets the receiver
Barrels: Grab right at the base of the barrel.
Mag tubes: Grab right where they attach.
Blast away!

modlist.Name: Meat's Rigs
Author: Meat_Banono
modlist.Description:
Meats Rigs is here! With 19 different flavors of tactical loot-hauling capability, these provide a fresh new take on the classic H3 floating quickbelt system. These range in slot capacity from a meager 4 to a back-breaking 20!
These are all found under Misc. -> Backpacks, as these all go into your backpack slot. They will conflict with most other quickbelt layouts, so I officially recommend using 'Concealed Carry' if you want extra weapons or 'Small Pockets' if you want a more extreme inventory juggling experience.
Learn them all and their various quirks (like pistol holsters on the MK3, Blackrock, and TV109) and practice those reload drills!

modlist.Name: Meat's ASh12
Author: Meat_Banono
modlist.Description:
This 'High Caliber Assault Submachine Gun', which sounds like a child's nonsensical description is actually the Russian description of this prototype CQB firearm. Actually chambered in 12.7x55mm, this version is chambered for 45. 70 Govt as a substitute until custom ammo becomes doable. Similar in Kinetic Energy, this gun will slap around some sosigs.
Found in the Assault Rifle Category, with 10, 20 round mags and an oversized muzzlebrake. I recommend the UZI suppressor as it is ludicrous in length.

modlist.Name: Meats Memes
Author: MeatBanono
modlist.Description: memes

modlist.Name: Meat's ASP
Author: Meat_Banono
Tactical Loon
modlist.Description:
This unique, sneaky cold-war era subcompact 9mm pistol has infiltrated H3VR! The ASP 9mm pistol features guttersnipe sights, transparent lexan side panels, and a 7 round single stack magazine that requires H3Utils to work.
The ASP can be found under automatic pistols.
A separate, larger picatinny guttersnipe sight can be found under the iron sights category.
I DO NOT recommend this pistol for any engagements beyond 15m without extensive practice or a high resolution VR headset. Please use the second image as reference for aiming with the ASP's sight, straight from the manual.
Massive thanks to Tactical Loon for the model and Drummerdude2003 for the texturing.

modlist.Name: Meat and Melon's MVP
Author: Meat_Banono
Tacticalloon
Nikpo
Melon The Gunwarden
modlist.Description:
The biggest collab to date in H3!
Melon's personal Mossberg MVP is in H3VR under the bolt action rifle category! Accepting 5.56 stanag mags in green polymer and ash wood, and 7.62 M14 mags in black polymer and beautifully oiled wood.
There is also a hidden bipod attach point towards the front that requires H3 Utils for a neat appear-on-attach feature!

modlist.Name: Meat's Cutout Mags
Author: Meat_Banono
Andrew_FTW
modlist.Description:
A pair of magazines extracted from an unknown Zone abroad, with massive witness holes hastily cut into the sides. 
\Included are the 6L20 and 6L10 magazines in 5.45x39mm and 7.62x39mm, respectively.
Found at the end of the Assault Rifles tab.

Gracious thanks to Andrew_FTW for the model surgery and textures.
Good luck out there!

modlist.Name: 45 Degree Barrel Extentions
Author: KamikazeF0X
modlist.Description:
Guns always shoots forwards, and this is boring!
Thanks to this barrel extension, you will be able to curve your bullets!
Due to how the game works, there is four attachments for the four directions you can put them in, Up, Down, Left and... Right, Right!
(For some other reasons, muzzle flash always points forwards, I haven't got to figure out why)

modlist.Name: SCR Rifle
Author: KamikazeF0X
modlist.Description:
This is a rifle version of the SCR Pistol
It features a hidden bottom rail and a hidden top rail on the wooden foregrip

modlist.Name: F2000 Tactical
Author: LioZuto
modlist.Description:
Yes, the Tactical version of the infamous F2000.
Top Rail, Side Rail and Suppressor Mount available.
Model from ; P3DM
F2000 Tactical is a proprietary of Fabrique National Herstal (FN Herstal).

modlist.Name: M14 EBR
Author: Carkidd
modlist.Description:
If you say someone can't have something, it just makes them want it more.
I present the Mk14 Enhanced Battle Rifle, specifically the Rock Island Arsenal version ordered for the US Army from 2008-2011.
To install, drop the files in the zip into the VirtualObjects folder. The EBR can be found under Battle Rifles and the DCSB under Rail Extenders.
Also includes the Sage Detachable Cantilever Sight Base, a rail extension designed to fit over the ejection port. I've made it attachable to any rail, so feel free to use it in whatever freaky creation you desire. 

Features 

-fully functional rails, including that weird one above the pistol grip
-barrel/suppressor mount - note that this removes both the muzzle brake and front irons, as they're integral to each other. No simple way around it other than some fuckery with a new front sight post, so use pic rail irons if you want. 
-glowing front sight that makes the irons actually usable
-collapsible buttstock 
-AR-15 like button bolt release, unlike the base M14

modlist.Name: FTW Arms Foregrips
Author: Andrew_FTW
Meat Banono
modlist.Description:
A nice collection of some new foregrips! And for those who have been modding for a while will notice, the CQR is back!
Includes the:
-BCM (Black and Tan)
-Cobra AFG
-CQR
-RK1
-RK2
-RK6
-TD
-Many, many more

modlist.Name: FN FNX-45 Tactical FDE
Author: Shampooh
modlist.Description: The FNX-45 Tactical in FDE and now black, now for your VR shootin. Features of a full set of custom handling and firing sounds, as well as a LAM, suppressor, and working slide cap. Just bring any attachment near the slide cap to hide it and attach an optic or whatever else you'd like.

modlist.Name: FOXArms Muzzles
Author: NotWolfie
Meat_Banono
modlist.Description:
Thanks to Potatoes , AndrewFT, @Warlord Soulbro of the Melon and Meatbanono , I present..

FOXARMS Attachments (Muzzles and Supressors)
Version 0.7.2

More muzzles and supressors are coming! Don't think I'm done yet!

Currently added
- Gemtech One (Scales)
- Rotor 43 (Scales)
- Titan Muzzle Combo (Muzzle and Supressor, Non-scale)
- Daniel Defence Combo (Muzzle and Supressor, Non-scale)
- Colt AR15 Flash-hider (Non-scale)
- GK-02 Shotgun Muzzle (Non-Scale)
- Fischer Glock Supressor (Has an attachment point)
- Alpha Dog (Has an attachment point)
- Vendetta Muzzle Brake
- CQB Muzzle Brake
- Titanium Compensator
- SRD Supressor

modlist.Name: FTW Arms VPO-215
Author: Andrew_FTW
modlist.Description: Here is the VPO-215! A tarkov favorite for many.

modlist.Name: 'Stechkin' APS
Author: Carkidd
modlist.Description:
'I just want to be less of a burden...'
Intended for vehicle crews and artillerymen, this Russian machinepistol is surprisingly practical in game- using both hands, it can be fired on full auto with good accuracy, and the wire stock and suppressor turn it into quite a handy little PDW. Comes with a 20 round magazine. The only thing holding it back is the lack of AP ammo in 9x18 in game. 
Due to code limitations on the game's handgun script, I am unable to get the proper three position selector/decocker and SA/DA operation (somehow broken on full auto pistols)- therefore, the weapon only has semi and full selector positions and is single action. Doesn't change much gameplay wise, just an inaccuracy.

modlist.Name: FTW Arms Super Shotgun
Author: Andrew_FTW
modlist.Description:
In the first age, in the first battle, when the shadows first lengthened, one stood. Charred by the embers of the Barbecue, his meat cooked by the fires of Hell and burned beyond consumption, he chose the path of perpetual torment. In his ravenous hatred he found no peace; and with broiling mustard he scoured the Meatmas Plains seeking vengeance against the Dark Meats who had wronged him. He wore the crown of the Bratwurst Sosigs, and those that tasted the bite of his fork named him... the Beef Slayer.
Thanks to Chargin for the beefy shotgun sounds

modlist.Name: FTW Arms Ammo Boxes
Author: Andrew_FTW
modlist.Description:
Tired of carrying piles of loose shells in your backpack? Wish you could hold more bullets in those large quickbelt slots? Do I have the mod for you! FTW Arms brand Ammo boxes comes with 5 brand new boxes of ammunition, including 9x19, 12 gauge, 5.45x39, 23x75mm, and 5.56x45, with more on the way in future updated! 

NOTE: 
THE BOXES ARE FOUND UNDER MUZZLE LOADER RIFLES

modlist.Name: Modern Warfighter Lights And Lasers
Author: Jayyden
modlist.Description: A collection of modern weapon lights and lasers, with reworked effects for better-looking attachments.

modlist.Name: Gunshields
Author: Carkidd
modlist.Description:
First off, thanks a ton to notcolin17 for creating these wonderful models.
Fight back against the hotdog menace with these two gun shields. The newer one offers easy viewing through its glass panels, while the old one allows use of iron sights with its center cutout. They are attachable to any picatinny rail, and can be found at the end of the list under Attachments > Decorative
These will block most gunfire from the front- some shots may slip around, especially with the old style shield, but overall you'll be protected from the enemy, especially at range. Some sosig guns, mainly the snipers, will penetrate, so watch out! 
NOTICE: Will lag quite badly with more than one shield attached when in Direct simulation mode! Switch to floating mode in the options panel under Simulation/Game options to remedy- my testing on my pretty weak PC let me get to at least 8 shields without much lag when moving. Make sure to reload the scene to finish changing this setting!
Known issues:
The modern shield freaks out and flies off a bit when spawning- this is just due to its positioning when it spawns in and I'm not sure how to change that!

modlist.Name: Desert Tech MDR
Author: sgt.brooks
modlist.Description:
MDR
THANKS TO Meat_banono FOR SEND MODEL

modlist.Name: [AR Five Seven] AR57
Author: sgt.brooks
modlist.Description: AR57

modlist.Name: Tavor 21
Author: sgt.brooks
modlist.Description: flip up sights work but one in rear clips because cant do angles

modlist.Name: H&K G28 DMR
Author: sgt.brooks
modlist.Description:
This is heckler koch g28 based off the hk417 7.62x51
Working front and rear flip up sights.
has it own mags also works with p762 pmags

modlist.Name: Knight's Armament m110
Author: sgt.brooks
modlist.Description:
sense we don't really have much 762 ar's decide go for m110

use mk17 mags

modlist.Name: Strafe SMG
Author: Gunlovers
modlist.Description: From the bloodiest game of 1996, this firearm returns from the olden days to find new blood and guts to spill!

modlist.Name: STRAFESCRAPPER WITH POLISHED GOLD WEAPONRY
Author: Gunlovers
modlist.Description:
Note: This mod is about playing aggressive and fast, it uses disposable weaponry built into the mod and is featured around strafe. It will be hard and there is a lot of enemies.
HEY YOU, YOU EVER WANTED TO PLAY FAST AND AGGRESSIVE LIKE ITS 1998 IN TAKE AND HOLD? HAVE YOU EVER WANTED TO SLAUGHTER THINGS OVER AND OVER AGAIN IN THE NEVER ENDING BATTLE. CONSTANTLY WATCHING AS YOUR ENTRAILS PAINT THE WALLS RED AFTER A GLORIOUS LAST STAND?
STRAFE SCRAPPER IS A GIANT BLEEDING LOVE LETTER TO THE INDIE GAME STRAFE. IT'S LOVINGLY CRAFTED BY GUNLOVERS IN AN ATTEMPT TO ANALOGIZE THE GAME INTO TAKE AND HOLD. FEATURING 4 ZONES AND A BOSS FIGHT THAT WILL LEAVE MOST KILLERS HANGING OUT TO DRY. NOW WITH DISPOSABLE WEAPONRY THAT REALLY PACK A PUNCH! NOT TO MENTION IT WILL ENCOURAGE AGGRESSIVE PLAYING BY MAKING ENEMIES DROP WEAPONRY TO USE AND KEYCARDS THAT GIVE HEALTH!
THIS MOD ALSO INCLUDES THE MODIFIED PRIMARIES AND THEY ARE UNIQUELY DIFFERENT. BE ON THE LOOK OUT FOR THEM IN THE TAKE AND HOLD SHOPS! 
Warning: it is not recommended to play this on one hit and it's totally fine to bump the hp up if you're not comfortable.
Please consult your doctor if you're not used to Locomotion, this mod favors it heavily. Do not attempt to play cowardly, you will not be able to survive.
All models, enemy baseline, sounds, and general behavior of the gamemode belong to Pixel Titans (Thom Glunt) and (Stephen Ramey) And all who helped on the inital game. Please show support to them.

modlist.Name: Gun Rack (Phys)
Author: TylerS76
modlist.Description:
Gun Rack (Physical version).
The textures are a bit fucked. Message me on Discord at TylerS76#2974 if you encounter errors.

modlist.Name: Gun Rack (QB)
Author: TylerS76
modlist.Description:
Gun Rack (QB version).
Message me on Discord at TylerS76#2974 if you encounter errors.

modlist.Name: Gun Hook
Author: TylerS76
modlist.Description:
It's a hook for hanging guns.
Message me on Discord at TylerS76#2974 if you encounter errors.

modlist.Name: G92M
Author: SovietPigeon
modlist.Description:
Sovietpigeon's G92M on the mod installer. 
A funny little cross between a Beretta, a Glock, and a USP Match.

modlist.Name: CCI Pepperbox
Author: KamikazeF0X
modlist.Description:
50 barrels break action .22 Long Rifle gun can either be a fun little plinker or an angry swarm of bees thanks to the selector on the left side of the reciver! This selector allows you to fire all the 50 barrels!
Note : In the future, if the break actions guns will have speedloaders, this will take a box of ammo like the ones from CCI (hence the name of the gun)

modlist.Name: Dump-O-Matic
Author: KamikazeF0X
modlist.Description:
The Dump-o-matic is the pinnacle of abusive consumerism!
This handgun holds up 8 rounds of 9mm Parabellum, with how poorly it is made, it would be surprising if it could fire one more...
It is spawnlockable, so once empty, spawn a new one, rack it and off you go!
There is also a golden unlimited ammo version, just for giggles

modlist.Name: Modern Warfighter Optics
Author: Jayyden
modlist.Description:
A collection of modern collimator optics meant for contemporary weapon systems in various sizes, shapes, and colors.
Contains the following attachments:
- Aimpoint CompM5 (Offset, Low, and High mounts)
- Aimpoint ACO (Straight, Cantilever, and Low mounts)
- Aimpoint T2 (Offset, Low, and High mounts)
- Aimpoint CompM4s
- Aimpoint ACRO (Low and High mounts)
- Eotech EXPS3 (Green and Red reticles)
- EoTech G33 Magnifier
- SIG Romeo1 (Offset, Low, and High mounts)
- SIG Romeo3 (Low and High mounts)
- SIG Romeo4T (Low and High mounts in Black and FDE)
- DOCTER SightIII (Offset, Low, and High mounts)
- Trijicon MRO
- Trijicon RMR (Offset, Low, and High mounts)
- Trijicon SRO (Offset, Low, and High mounts)
- Trijicon ACOG TA02
- Vortex Venom
- Vortex StrikefireII
- Vortex Crossfire
- Vortex UH-1 Huey Gen III
- Leupold DeltaPoint (Offset, Low, and High mounts)

modlist.Name: Modern Warfighter Rails
Author: Jayyden
modlist.Description:
Adds an assortment of MLOK rails and risers that allow for further customization of weapons.

Contains:
- UTG Risers (.5 inch /.75 inch/ 1 inch heights in 3-slot and 13 slot lengths)
- MLOK Rails (FDE/OD/Black colors in 3-slot, 5-slot, 7-slot, 9-slot, 11-slot, and cantilever-type rails)

Want to support me and help me afford more models to implement, or otherwise feel like you have too much money burning a hole in your wallet? I now have a Ko-fi open for donations!
https://ko-fi.com/jayyden

modlist.Name: The Key Ring
Author: KamikazeF0X
modlist.Description:
This adds 6 new underbarrel firearms on the base of the already in game 'Spare Key' and the 'House Key'

The Scooter Key - A tiny one chambered in 12ga short
The Tractor Key - A quite rural one that shoots military grade 50mm... potatoes
The Truck Key - A punchy gun that fires 20x82mm rounds
The Boat Key - A pocket solution for .50BMG 
The Plane Key - A useful one that uses 27x90mm (Oversized Kolibri rounds)
The Safe Key - A mortar that attaches under any big enough guns that can whistand the power of .45ACP Oversized!

modlist.Name: ShotSword
Author: KamikazeF0X
modlist.Description:
This is a quite dangerous sword, but also a deadly shotgun!
Load this weapon with Dragon's Breath ammo and unleash terror among sliced and grilled sosigs!

The weapon is in 'Shotguns > Tube Fed'
It holds 3 rounds in the internal mag plus one in the chamber
It features a 'Hidden' attachment point on the top for stuff like a laser pointer

modlist.Name: More Tilt Rails
Author: Shampooh
modlist.Description: Adds two new tilt rails: 30 degrees and 45 degrees. Why, you ask? I needed a camera rig for my magazine video and wanted to have the rail cam looking dead on at the magazine. And maybe someone else can think of something else interesting to do with these, I know a few folks have mentioned that this could be practical for grenade launchers.

modlist.Name: Shampooh's Magazine(s)
Author: Shampooh
modlist.Description:
It's a set of magazines. Sorta. At a literal level there's more than one magazine right now, but they're just reskins. In time, this will include more magazines with a particular focus on anything I can find with nicely modeled springs and windows. Heck, I'm already sitting on a few models folks have shared with me and more ideas of things to pull out of MW.

Currently contains:

MW'19's MCX Magazines, 3 skins - Found in Assault Rifles category

Credits

All assets from Modern Warfare '19
Very big thank you to Potatoes for implementing the model swapping functionality for mag followers into H3VR utils, without which this wouldn't be nearly as nice as it is

To do:

* Actual accurate Lancer magazine
* PMAG with useful window
* MW's AN-94 magazine for 5.45
* Recycle the spring and follower from that for a 7.62 magazine maybe?
* MW's P90 magazines

modlist.Name: Flash Shield
Author: Shampooh
modlist.Description:
Adds a functioning flash shield to the game. The shield is powered by 23mm 'Batteries'; spawn one from the ammo spawner, open the 'battery compartment' with a side press on the touchpad, insert the 'battery', and close it with another touchpad press. Activate the flash with the trigger when necessary, and then you can open the 'battery compartment' up again and tilt the shield to discard the empty 'battery'. Note that opening the 'battery compartment' primes the flash system, indicated by the status light turning green: if you hit the trigger while it's open on accident, you can just open and close it again to re-arm it.
In terms of protection, the center of the shield is strongest and nearly impenetrable. Rifle rounds and more powerful can penetrate the glass if they come in at a solid angle, so mind how you fight!
Also features some fancy parallax-enabled custom bullet impact decals and sounds, because getting shot at is scary and inconvenient.

Credits

All assets from Modern Warfare '19

To do:

* Andrew_FTW has offered to create an ammo box for the 'batteries' to spawn alongside the shields to eliminate the need for the ammo spawner, which would be super convenient; I intend to implement that as soon as he's got it ready

What the hell is a 23mm battery?

Okay, nerd, I'll break kayfabe for you. The shield achieves its flash effect using the KS-23's flashbang shells, which are the ammo you need to spawn and load into it. For convenience's sake, I recommend vaulting a shield with a shell loaded so you don't need to get the ammo spawner out every time you use it.
If you're technically curious: Because H3's zvezda shells fire a magical flashbang grenade instead of being a flashbang shell, the 'muzzle' of the shield is pointed inwards towards itself to get it to detonate immediately. This also means you can't load and use any projectiles to create a funny lethal shield.

modlist.Name: M1014 Picatinny Sights
Author: KamikazeF0X
modlist.Description: This is a pair of Iron Sights found on M1014 but modified for Picatinny rails

modlist.Name: FTW Arms Spawnable Targets
Author: Andrew_FTW
modlist.Description: Sick of waiting for gameplanner in order to live out your IPSC dreams? Well does FTW Arms have the mod for you! Extract this bad boy into your virtual objects, and take a look in the targets section of the item spawner for all your targety needs!

modlist.Name: Meat Mincer
Author: KamikazeF0X
modlist.Description:
This is a simple meat mincer... That shoots bullets like a gatling!
Fill the hopper with ammo, and off you go!

You need Cursed.DLLs for loading this thing, so it will take anything you throw inside
Otherwhise, you will be only able to feed it 9mm Parabellum

This is in the item spawner as a Support > Machine Gun 

Don't forget, you can't snapturn with ammo in the hopper and you must be gentile while moving it full, physics in games aren't quite made for that kind of dumb gat!

There will be two bugs due to how it is set up :
You must attach a barrel extander if you want to attach a suppressor
You can't attach bipods

modlist.Name: FTW Arms AN-94
Author: Andrew_FTW
modlist.Description: Time for the technical and engineering marvel that is the Avtomat Nikonova 94, formally known as the AN-94. Chambered in 5.45 x 39, this guns defining feature is its hyperburst. With a burst fire rate of 1800 rpm, this guns burst beats out the vector with a measly 1200 rpm. The full auto fire rate is a very controllable 600 RPM, making it usable at medium ranges.

modlist.Name: Arctic Warfare Weapons
Author: Pheonixcraft99
modlist.Description:
Ever wanted more Arctic Warfare weapons in-game? No? Well I do!
This mod includes the following weapons:

- AWP (Black, White, and Green)
- AWF (White and Green)
- AWSM-F and AWM-F (Green)
- AWS (White and Black)
- AWC (Includes Suppressor, White and Black)
- AW (White and Green)

(Marked under Arctic Warfare in Bolt Action Rifles)

- AWC -
The Arctic Warfare Covert features a folding stock paired with an extremely short barrel compared to other AW models. You can attach a unique suppressor that covers the barrel of the rifle in seconds for quick and quiet kills. Chambered in .308 Winchester.

- AWSM-F and AWM-F -
The AWSM (Arctic Warfare Super Magnum) and AWM (Arctic Warfare Magnum) are chambered in .308 Winchester and .338 Lupta Magnum accordingly, with 5rnd magazines. They both feature a Folding Stock.

- AWP -
The AWP is a shorter-barreled rifle that lacks the Muzzle Break most other AW models are made with. The AWP is most popular for its inclusion on videogames, however it is often included inaccurately - unlike this mod. Chambered in .308 Winchester.

- AW and AWF -
The first modern rifles, the Arctic Warfare and Arctic Warfare Folding serve as the 'Middle Grounds' for super long range and long range combat, with an average barrel length and chambered for .308 Winchester rounds. The AWF is a folding stock variant of the AW.

- AWS -
The Arctic Warfare Silenced is a version of the AWP with a much longer barrel and integral suppressor providing top-quality sound masking. Chambered for .308 Winchester.

modlist.Name: M3 Predator
Author: SovietPigeon
modlist.Description: The M3 Predator from the Mass Effect trilogy (we don't talk aboutAndromeda), now in Virtual Reality. Mildly janky but 100% accurate tothe games. Sorry about the shit textures.

modlist.Name: P2062
Author: Phoenixcraft99
modlist.Description:
The P2062 is an updated version of the P226 used specifically for elite police forces in the year 2062.

LORE

The P2062 is a one-of-a-kind pistol that fires .38 Special Cartridgesusing an advanced electromagnetic acceleration system, technicallymaking it a hybrid coil gun. Currently only one pistol has survivedbeing destroyed out of the 30 originally produced, and is still in usetoday. Due to its unusual ammunition it is extremely expensive to keepthe weapon operable, as every magazine is loaded with a battery thatpowers the magnetic acceleration in the P2062's barrel.

If you can identify where I based this gun off of you're a god.

modlist.Name: Artyom's Trench Knife
Author: RedLinePigeon
modlist.Description: This thing is surprisingly large... yes I did rescale it.have fun with this one, more to come.

modlist.Name: Skeleton Knife
Author: gamernayr
modlist.Description:
Skeleton knife (vanilla) from CS:GO. Spawn-lockable, so throw as many as you like!

Located under Melee>Throwable.

modlist.Name: Destiny Hunter Knife
Author: gamernayr
modlist.Description: Straight from the destiny arsenal, the hunter's knife! This model isjust as large as you'd think it is, and in true destiny fashion, reallygood at throwing.

modlist.Name: Seventh Seraph Service Revoler (Destiny 2)
Author: gamernayr
modlist.Description:
First gun I've made so it was a good learning experience.
Lots of work to do still on it, including getting the sights working.For now, there's an invisible rail on top and I highly recommend you useit.
It accepts .357 magnum and if you want to use a speedloader there is oneunder the Unica6. It might look like the bullets won't line up with theloader but thanks to Anton that's not a problem. The chambers aresupposed to look wonky, no need for concern
Let me know if you find anything!

modlist.Name: FTW Arms 3D Printed Weapons
Author: Andrew_FTW
modlist.Description:
Who needs a wizbangadinger when you could get a 3D printer!
Here's a few of your favorite 3d printed weapons, including the FGC-9, the WTF-9, the Songbird, the Tactical Tusk, and a Saturn Suppressor

modlist.Name: FTW Arms Seventh Seraph Revolver
Author: Andrew_FTW
Nikpo
modlist.Description:
For the first time ever, FTW Arms presents the Seventh Seraph Revolverwith removable cylinders! You can smack them out using another cylinder,or use the mag release. 
Thank you to Nikpo for the model and beautiful textures.

modlist.Name: SR1MP Gyurza
Author: gamernayr
modlist.Description:
SR1MP Gyurza, graciously ported from tarkov.
Includes the two mounts (1 rail, and 4 rail), the silencer, and the adapter for the silencer.
To mount the silencer, there is an invisible rail meant for the adapter on the other side of the bottom rail.
Due to ammo limitations, the gun is chambered in 9x23 instead of 9x21.
Small bug with the magazine pose after ejecting it, but it shouldn't hinder any operation.
Find the gun and all of it's attachments under Pistols>Automatic.

modlist.Name: Rust SAR
Author: Andrew_FTW
modlist.Description:
Be the bane of your neighborhood sosigs with the all-purpose andreliable Semi-Auto Rifle from Rust. You can save your components,because this puppy comes pre-crafted and chambered in 7.62x39m, ready todown anyone, naked or geared, that crosses your path.
Included are two versions: the original SAR, in all of it's rusty glory,and a super illegal Full Auto conversion (because who needs an AK or anLR anyway?).
Also included are two mag options, the standard 16-rounder and anextended 30-rounder for less reloads and more headshots, and theHandmade Sight, should you need fitting companion for this tool of sosigdestruction!

modlist.Name: Modern Warfare M4A1
Author: Supurfly83
modlist.Description:
"We get dirty and the world stays clean."

The Modern Warfare M4A1!

The iconic Assault Rifle from media all over appears in its Modern Warfare flesh!
First time doing a weapon for H3VR, so there are a couple minor issues, but all of them are just things that I would love to just touch up in the future (Literally Unplayable). Nothing that would effect gameplay or immersion!

Huge shoutout to the H3VR Homebrew Discord, they helped me a bunch!

Credits:
Models/Sounds - Infinity Ward

Let me know if you find anything, as this made made and tested in a day.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1TfNfojWV_d28jtke7wphjdwFLGSTxv7C/view?usp=sharing

Author: Meat_Banono
Jayyden
modlist.Description:
For Canadian Speakers:
Forged in the Great White North held firmly in the grasp of a true chad Mountie on Mooseback, the Canadian C7A2 service rifle comes to H3 with its signature C79 Elcan scope and TRIAD front sight post to apologize for not having been in the game sooner! 

For American Speakers:
Green M16 with green scope.

The C7A2 can be found under Assault Rifle category

The C79 Elcan can be found under Scopes category, in both standard and illuminated variants!

This mod requires H3Utils for a hyper immersive moving bolt catch and mag release! Never guess if you're empty again!

Many thanks to Jayyden for the scope, and Somnambulist for generously providing the model!
I also have a Ko-Fi, if you really feel like donating or contributing towards a stretch goal like new gun models!
Ko-fi.com/meatbanana

modlist.Name: ModulHK
Author: NotWolfie
modlist.Description:
1.0.1 Magwelled

Fixes:
- Re-added the texture to the HK7 Magwell

IMPORTANT: This mod was designed to be an Expansion/DLC of ModulAR, and is made to be used with it.

Download that here: https://bonetome.com/h3vr/weapons/450/

LATEST VERSION OF H3VRUTILS REQUIRED!

Installation: Place ModulHK.deli into your Deli mod's folder.

~ Notes ~

- HK's rail is higher, meaning you have to use the upper if you want to use the handguards.
- HK's buffer tube is longer and results in some problems with it, I've tried my best to reduce it and I'm still looking into fixes.

Chunky AR.

Introducing the MODULHK! An Expansion to the ModulAR platform.

Including the 60 round PMAG, and the cursed HK7 Lower which takes MP7 Mags!

Included are:
2 Lowers
1 Upper
Countless Handguards
1 Buffer
2 Stocks
1 Pistol Grip
1 Piston/Gasblock
5 Barrels (With folding sights!)
30 round Maritime Steel
60 round Magpul PMAG.
Unique HK416A5 Rear sight

Want to support my work?

modlist.Name: ModulFAL (Enhanced Edition)
Author: NotWolfie
modlist.Description:
Version 1.0.1 Oops
H3VRUTILS AND OTHERLOADER ARE REQUIRED.

- Install Location is in your Deli Mods folder.

- This is the Enhanced edition, meaning you have to press down on the touchpad to remove the magazine. - 

Belgium Made, BABY!

Features
- COMPATIBLITY WITH MEAT'S MODULAK PISTOL-GRIPS!
- COMPATIBLITY WITH MEAT'S MODULAR STOCKS!
- Two Receivers (FAL and SA47, the Cursed one)
- Different Barrel lengths!
- Folding Stocks!
- Unique parts and a customizable rear-sight!
- New FAL magazines!
- Juicy Noises!
- Two length handguards, some custom-made
- Ability to single-load your rounds into the gun!
- Original Wood bits!
- Polymer cold-war bits!
- Modern bits! 
- Working and moving bolt catch!
- Classic rear sight and muzzles!
- Full PARA Kit!

You can find all the parts in as follows;
Receivers and Magazines - Battle Rifle 
Dust Covers - Rail Adapters
Pistol Grips - Foregrips
Handguards - Foregrips 
Stocks - Stocks
Sights - Iron Sights
Barrels - Supressors/Muzzle Device

Want to support my work? 
Buy me a coffee! 
https://ko-fi.com/woofwoof4723

Special thanks to Doombox for giving me textures and parts for some of the original stuff!

modlist.Name: modulSVD
Author: gamernayr
modlist.Description:
Modular SVD features the all famous big boy AK chambered in 7.62x54R.

This is a Deli 0.3.2 mod, and goes into H3VR/Deli/Mods, and requires OtherLoader.

Everything is separated into 2 categories under SMG/Rifle>Battle Rifle:
Default: Contains all the basic things, receiver, stock, upper band, etc.
Extras: All the aftermarket or attachment things

Just a tip: I recommend putting the upper band on from the top and fores on from the bottom.
Due to me not wanted things to be naturally cursed, it doesn't accept AR/AK fores, but does accept pistol grips and stocks.
Also note: You need the front post to put on a silencer.
